verses.text: Now these are the divisions of the sons of Aaron. The sons of Aaron; Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.

similars.text: And these are the names of the sons of Aaron; Nadab the firstborn, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
And the children of Amram; Aaron, and Moses, and Miriam. The sons also of Aaron; Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
And unto Aaron was born Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
Thus were they divided by lot, one sort with another; for the governors of the sanctuary, and governors of the house of God, were of the sons of Eleazar, and of the sons of Ithamar.

And there were more chief men found of the sons of Eleazar than of the sons of Ithamar; and thus were they divided. Among the sons of Eleazar there were sixteen chief men of the house of their fathers, and eight among the sons of Ithamar according to the house of their fathers.
And these are the sons of Aaron; Eleazar his son, Phinehas his son, Abishua his son,

And take thou unto thee Aaron thy brother, and his sons with him, from among the children of Israel, that he may minister unto me in the priest's office, even Aaron, Nadab and Abihu, Eleazar and Ithamar, Aaron's sons.
These are the names of the men which shall divide the land unto you: Eleazar the priest, and Joshua the son of Nun.
So concerning them Moses commanded Eleazar the priest, and Joshua the son of Nun, and the chief fathers of the tribes of the children of Israel:
And these are the names of the sons of Aaron; Nadab the firstborn, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.

And unto Aaron was born Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
These are the names of the sons of Aaron, the priests which were anointed, whom he consecrated to minister in the priest's office.
Thus were they divided by lot, one sort with another; for the governors of the sanctuary, and governors of the house of God, were of the sons of Eleazar, and of the sons of Ithamar.
The son of Abishua, the son of Phinehas, the son of Eleazar, the son of Aaron the chief priest:

verses.text: But Nadab and Abihu died before their father, and had no children: therefore Eleazar and Ithamar executed the priest's office.

similars.text: And Nadab and Abihu died before the Lord, when they offered strange fire before the Lord, in the wilderness of Sinai, and they had no children: and Eleazar and Ithamar ministered in the priest's office in the sight of Aaron their father.

verses.text: And David distributed them, both Zadok of the sons of Eleazar, and Ahimelech of the sons of Ithamar, according to their offices in their service.

These are the inheritances, which Eleazar the priest, and Joshua the son of Nun, and the heads of the fathers of the tribes of the children of Israel, divided for an inheritance by lot in Shiloh before the Lord, at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation. So they made an end of dividing the country.

verses.text: And Shemaiah the son of Nethaneel the scribe, one of the Levites, wrote them before the king, and the princes, and Zadok the priest, and Ahimelech the son of Abiathar, and before the chief of the fathers of the priests and Levites: one principal household being taken for Eleazar, and one taken for Ithamar.

And Zadok the son of Ahitub, and Abimelech the son of Abiathar, were the priests; and Shavsha was scribe;

Then he went down into the king's house, into the scribe's chamber: and, lo, all the princes sat there, even Elishama the scribe, and Delaiah the son of Shemaiah, and Elnathan the son of Achbor, and Gemariah the son of Shaphan, and Zedekiah the son of Hananiah, and all the princes.

And I made treasurers over the treasuries, Shelemiah the priest, and Zadok the scribe, and of the Levites, Pedaiah: and next to them was Hanan the son of Zaccur, the son of Mattaniah: for they were counted faithful, and their office was to distribute unto their brethren.
And Sheva was scribe: and Zadok and Abiathar were the priests:

And with them he sent Levites, even Shemaiah, and Nethaniah, and Zebadiah, and Asahel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehonathan, and Adonijah, and Tobijah, and Tob-adonijah, Levites; and with them Elishama and Jehoram, priests.
Elihoreph and Ahiah, the sons of Shisha, scribes; Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, the recorder.
These were in the days of Joiakim the son of Jeshua, the son of Jozadak, and in the days of Nehemiah the governor, and of Ezra the priest, the scribe.

And the chief fathers of the families of the children of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, of the families of the sons of Joseph, came near, and spake before Moses, and before the princes, the chief fathers of the children of Israel:
Also of the Levites: Shemaiah the son of Hashub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, the son of Bunni;
And these were the princes which he had; Azariah the son of Zadok the priest,
And of the Levites; Shemaiah the son of Hasshub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, of the sons of Merari;

verses.text: These were the orderings of them in their service to come into the house of the Lord, according to their manner, under Aaron their father, as the Lord God of Israel had commanded him.

similars.text: And after that went the Levites in to do their service in the tabernacle of the congregation before Aaron, and before his sons: as the Lord had commanded Moses concerning the Levites, so did they unto them.
Their brethren also the Levites were appointed unto all manner of service of the tabernacle of the house of God.

According to the commandment of the Lord they were numbered by the hand of Moses, every one according to his service, and according to his burden: thus were they numbered of him, as the Lord commanded Moses.

And he appointed, according to the order of David his father, the courses of the priests to their service, and the Levites to their charges, to praise and minister before the priests, as the duty of every day required: the porters also by their courses at every gate: for so had David the man of God commanded.
And his sons did unto him according as he commanded them:

At the appointment of Aaron and his sons shall be all the service of the sons of the Gershonites, in all their burdens, and in all their service: and ye shall appoint unto them in charge all their burdens.

Because their office was to wait on the sons of Aaron for the service of the house of the Lord, in the courts, and in the chambers, and in the purifying of all holy things, and the work of the service of the house of God;

All these were under the hands of their father for song in the house of the Lord, with cymbals, psalteries, and harps, for the service of the house of God, according to the king's order to Asaph, Jeduthun, and Heman.
And this he said unto them, having been commanded of God; and they did walk uprightly before God, imparting to one another both temporally and spiritually according to their needs and their wants.

And, behold, the courses of the priests and the Levites, even they shall be with thee for all the service of the house of God: and there shall be with thee for all manner of workmanship every willing skilful man, for any manner of service: also the princes and all the people will be wholly at thy commandment.
And Moses and Aaron did as the Lord commanded them, so did they.

And the children of Israel did according to all that the Lord commanded Moses: so they pitched by their standards, and so they set forward, every one after their families, according to the house of their fathers.
And some of the chief of the fathers, when they came to the house of the Lord which is at Jerusalem, offered freely for the house of God to set it up in his place:
And he set the priests in their charges, and encouraged them to the service of the house of the Lord,
And Moses and Aaron were brought again unto Pharaoh: and he said unto them, Go, serve the Lord your God: but who are they that shall go?

And the people shall take them, and bring them to their place: and the house of Israel shall possess them in the land of the Lord for servants and handmaids: and they shall take them captives, whose captives they were; and they shall rule over their oppressors.

Beside their genealogy of males, from three years old and upward, even unto every one that entereth into the house of the Lord, his daily portion for their service in their charges according to their courses;
And the Lord God of their fathers sent to them by his messengers, rising up betimes, and sending; because he had compassion on his people, and on his dwelling place:
When they had sent unto the house of God Sherezer and Regem-melech, and their men, to pray before the Lord,

And again, my brethren, I would cite your minds forward to the time when the Lord God gave these commandments unto his children; and I would that ye should remember that the Lord God ordained priests, after his holy order, which was after the order of his Son, to teach these things unto the people.
So Aaron and his sons did all things which the Lord commanded by the hand of Moses.

Howbeit the Lord God of Israel chose me before all the house of my father to be king over Israel for ever: for he hath chosen Judah to be the ruler; and of the house of Judah, the house of my father; and among the sons of my father he liked me to make me king over all Israel:
The vessels also that are given thee for the service of the house of thy God, those deliver thou before the God of Jerusalem.

These are they that were numbered of the families of the sons of Gershon, of all that might do service in the tabernacle of the congregation, whom Moses and Aaron did number according to the commandment of the Lord.

And after that went the Levites in to do their service in the tabernacle of the congregation before Aaron, and before his sons: as the Lord had commanded Moses concerning the Levites, so did they unto them.

These were they that were numbered of the families of the Kohathites, all that might do service in the tabernacle of the congregation, which Moses and Aaron did number according to the commandment of the Lord by the hand of Moses.
These are those that were numbered, which Moses and Aaron numbered, and the princes of Israel, being twelve men: each one was for the house of his fathers.

verses.text: And the rest of the sons of Levi were these: Of the sons of Amram; Shubael: of the sons of Shubael; Jehdeiah.

The sons also of Hezron, that were born unto him; Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai.
And of the sons of Heman; Jehiel, and Shimei: and of the sons of Jeduthun; Shemaiah, and Uzziel.
And Ibneiah the son of Jeroham, and Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri, and Meshullam the son of Shephathiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah;
Of the sons of Uzziel; Michah the first, and Jesiah the second.
And the sons of Hebron; Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.
Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,
And the sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,
And the sons of Shimei were, Jahath, Zina, and Jeush, and Beriah. These four were the sons of Shimei.
And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.
And Adaiah the son of Jeroham, the son of Pashur, the son of Malchijah, and Maasiai the son of Adiel, the son of Jahzerah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Meshillemith, the son of Immer;
And the sons of Jether; Jephunneh, and Pispah, and Ara.
And the sons of Jahdai; Regem, and Jotham, and Geshan, and Pelet, and Ephah, and Shaaph.
And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.
And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.
The son of Elkanah, the son of Joel, the son of Azariah, the son of Zephaniah,
The sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel, four.
The son of Amariah, the son of Azariah, the son of Meraioth,
And the sons of Caleb the son of Jephunneh; Iru, Elah, and Naam: and the sons of Elah, even Kenaz.
And Joel, and Jehu the son of Josibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,
The sons of Naphtali; Jahziel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shallum, the sons of Bilhah.
And Joelah, and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham of Gedor.
And the sons of Kohath were, Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
And the sons of Kohath by their families; Amram, and Izehar, Hebron, and Uzziel.
And he had brethren the sons of Jehoshaphat, Azariah, and Jehiel, and Zechariah, and Azariah, and Michael, and Shephatiah: all these were the sons of Jehoshaphat king of Israel.
And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.
And the sons of Shamer; Ahi, and Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.
And of the sons of Pashur; Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethaneel, Jozabad, and Elasah.
And the sons of Kenaz; Othniel, and Seraiah: and the sons of Othniel; Hathath.
The sons of Merari by Jaaziah; Beno, and Shoham, and Zaccur, and Ibri.
Of Zebulun, Ishmaiah the son of Obadiah: of Naphtali, Jerimoth the son of Azriel:
The sons also of Jediael; Bilhan: and the sons of Bilhan; Jeush, and Benjamin, and Ehud, and Chenaanah, and Zethan, and Tharshish, and Ahishahar.
And of the sons of Elizaphan; Shimri, and Jeiel: and of the sons of Asaph; Zechariah, and Mattaniah:
The sons of Judah; Pharez, Hezron, and Carmi, and Hur, and Shobal.
And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tahrea, and Ahaz.
And the sons of Jehaleleel; Ziph, and Ziphah, Tiria, and Asareel.
Now the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel were, Mesha his firstborn, which was the father of Ziph; and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.
Of the sons of Hashum; Mattenai, Mattathah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasseh, and Shimei.
The sons of Zophah; Suah, and Harnepher, and Shual, and Beri, and Imrah,
And of the sons of Immer; Hanani, and Zebadiah.
The chief was Ahiezer, then Joash, the sons of Shemaah the Gibeathite; and Jeziel, and Pelet, the sons of Azmaveth; and Berachah, and Jehu the Antothite,
The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.
Judah, and Benjamin, and Shemaiah, and Jeremiah,
Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess:
And of the priests; Jedaiah, and Jehoiarib, and Jachin,
And the sons of Eshek his brother were, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
And the sons of Asher; Jimnah, and Ishuah, and Isui, and Beriah, and Serah their sister: and the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel.
And of the sons of Elam; Jeshaiah the son of Athaliah, and with him seventy males.
And the sons of Becher; Zemira, and Joash, and Eliezer, and Elioenai, and Omri, and Jerimoth, and Abiah, and Anathoth, and Alameth. All these are the sons of Becher.
And of the last sons of Adonikam, whose names are these, Eliphelet, Jeiel, and Shemaiah, and with them threescore males.
And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.

Then certain of the heads of the children of Ephraim, Azariah the son of Johanan, Berechiah the son of Meshillemoth, and Jehizkiah the son of Shallum, and Amasa the son of Hadlai, stood up against them that came from the war,

And at Jerusalem dwelt certain of the children of Judah, and of the children of Benjamin. Of the children of Judah; Athaiah the son of Uzziah, the son of Zechariah, the son of Amariah, the son of Shephatiah, the son of Mahalaleel, of the children of Perez;
And the sons of Ezra were, Jether, and Mered, and Epher, and Jalon: and she bare Miriam, and Shammai, and Ishbah the father of Eshtemoa.
These were the sons of Caleb the son of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah; Shobal the father of Kirjath-jearim,
The sons of Simeon were, Nemuel, and Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, and Shaul:
Of Heman: the sons of Heman; Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, and Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, and Romamti-ezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir, and Mahazioth:
Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;
And of the sons of Harim; Eliezer, Ishijah, Malchiah, Shemaiah, Shimeon,
Moreover of Israel: of the sons of Parosh; Ramiah, and Jeziah, and Malchiah, and Miamin, and Eleazar, and Malchijah, and Benaiah.
And the sons of Uzziel; Mishael, and Elzaphan, and Zithri.

verses.text: Of the sons of Uzziel; Michah: of the sons of Michah; Shamir.

similars.text: Of the sons of Uzziel; Michah the first, and Jesiah the second.
And the sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.

Tahath his son, Uriel his son, Uzziah his son, and Shaul his son.
And the sons of Uzziel; Mishael, and Elzaphan, and Zithri.
And of the sons of Heman; Jehiel, and Shimei: and of the sons of Jeduthun; Shemaiah, and Uzziel.

Of the sons of Uzziel; Michah the first, and Jesiah the second.

And of the sons of Heman; Jehiel, and Shimei: and of the sons of Jeduthun; Shemaiah, and Uzziel.
Of the sons of Izhar; Shelomith the chief.
And the sons of Mishma; Hamuel his son, Zacchur his son, Shimei his son.
The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
Of Simeon; Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai.
And of the sons of Harim; Maaseiah, and Elijah, and Shemaiah, and Jehiel, and Uzziah.
And of the sons of Harim; Eliezer, Ishijah, Malchiah, Shemaiah, Shimeon,
And of the sons of Elizaphan; Shimri, and Jeiel: and of the sons of Asaph; Zechariah, and Mattaniah:
Of the Izharites; Shelomoth: of the sons of Shelomoth; Jahath.
And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;
The sons of Merari; Mahli, Libni his son, Shimei his son, Uzza his son,
And of the sons of Immer; Hanani, and Zebadiah.
Of the sons of Hashum; Mattenai, Mattathah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasseh, and Shimei.
And the sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
Of Zebulun, Ishmaiah the son of Obadiah: of Naphtali, Jerimoth the son of Azriel:
The son of Ethan, the son of Zimmah, the son of Shimei,
And Ibneiah the son of Jeroham, and Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri, and Meshullam the son of Shephathiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah;
The sons of Merari; Mahli, and Mushi. The sons of Mahli; Eleazar, and Kish.
And of the Levites; Shemaiah the son of Hasshub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, of the sons of Merari;
The son of Zerahiah, the son of Uzzi, the son of Bukki,
Also of the Levites: Shemaiah the son of Hashub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, the son of Bunni;
And of the sons of Bani; Meshullam, Malluch, and Adaiah, Jashub, and Sheal, and Ramoth.
Tahath his son, Uriel his son, Uzziah his son, and Shaul his son.
Of Judah, Elihu, one of the brethren of David: of Issachar, Omri the son of Michael:

verses.text: The brother of Michah was Isshiah: of the sons of Isshiah; Zechariah.

similars.text: Concerning Rehabiah: of the sons of Rehabiah, the first was Isshiah.
And of the sons of Elam; Mattaniah, Zechariah, and Jehiel, and Abdi, and Jeremoth, and Eliah.
And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;
Of the sons of Uzziel; Michah the first, and Jesiah the second.
And he had brethren the sons of Jehoshaphat, Azariah, and Jehiel, and Zechariah, and Azariah, and Michael, and Shephatiah: all these were the sons of Jehoshaphat king of Israel.
Of the sons of Uzziel; Michah the first, and Jesiah the second.

verses.text: The sons of Merari were Mahli and Mushi: the sons of Jaaziah; Beno.

And of the sons of Immer; Hanani, and Zebadiah.
The sons of Benjamin; Bela, and Becher, and Jediael, three.
And the sons of Gad; Ziphion, and Haggi, Shuni, and Ezbon, Eri, and Arodi, and Areli.
And the sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
And these were the sons of Levi by their names; Gershon, and Kohath, and Merari.
And the sons of Hebron; Jeriah the first, Amariah the second, Jahaziel the third, Jekameam the fourth.

And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;

Of the sons of Nebo; Jeiel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Jadau, and Joel, Benaiah.
Of the sons of Hashum; Mattenai, Mattathah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasseh, and Shimei.
The sons of Naphtali; Jahziel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shallum, the sons of Bilhah.

And the sons of Shamer; Ahi, and Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.

The son of Amariah, the son of Azariah, the son of Meraioth,
The sons of Pharez; Hezron, and Hamul.
And of the sons of Elizaphan; Shimri, and Jeiel: and of the sons of Asaph; Zechariah, and Mattaniah:
And the sons of Zebulun; Sered, and Elon, and Jahleel.

verses.text: Of Mahli came Eleazar, who had no sons.

similars.text: And Eleazar died, and had no sons, but daughters: and their brethren the sons of Kish took them.
The sons of Merari; Mahli, and Mushi. The sons of Mahli; Eleazar, and Kish.

verses.text: Concerning Kish: the son of Kish was Jerahmeel.

similars.text: Now there was a man of Benjamin, whose name was Kish, the son of Abiel, the son of Zeror, the son of Bechorath, the son of Aphiah, a Benjamite, a mighty man of power.

verses.text: The sons also of Mushi; Mahli, and Eder, and Jerimoth. These were the sons of the Levites after the house of their fathers.

similars.text: The sons of Merari; Mahli, and Mushi. And these are the families of the Levites according to their fathers.

And the sons of Merari; Mahali and Mushi: these are the families of Levi according to their generations.

Then the Levites arose, Mahath the son of Amasai, and Joel the son of Azariah, of the sons of the Kohathites: and of the sons of Merari, Kish the son of Abdi, and Azariah the son of Jehalelel: and of the Gershonites; Joah the son of Zimmah, and Eden the son of Joah:
Take the sum of the sons of Kohath from among the sons of Levi, after their families, by the house of their fathers,
The sons of Merari were Mahli and Mushi: the sons of Jaaziah; Beno.
The sons of Mushi; Mahli, and Eder, and Jeremoth, three.

Then the Levites arose, Mahath the son of Amasai, and Joel the son of Azariah, of the sons of the Kohathites: and of the sons of Merari, Kish the son of Abdi, and Azariah the son of Jehalelel: and of the Gershonites; Joah the son of Zimmah, and Eden the son of Joah:
Of the sons of Hashum; Mattenai, Mattathah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasseh, and Shimei.
And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.
And the sons of Uzziel; Mishael, and Elzaphan, and Zithri.

These were the sons of Levi after the house of their fathers; even the chief of the fathers, as they were counted by number of names by their polls, that did the work for the service of the house of the Lord, from the age of twenty years and upward.
The sons of Merari; Mahli, Libni his son, Shimei his son, Uzza his son,
And their brethren of the house of their fathers were, Michael, and Meshullam, and Sheba, and Jorai, and Jachan, and Zia, and Heber, seven.
And the sons of Izhar; Korah, and Nepheg, and Zichri.
And of the sons of Heman; Jehiel, and Shimei: and of the sons of Jeduthun; Shemaiah, and Uzziel.
The sons also of Jediael; Bilhan: and the sons of Bilhan; Jeush, and Benjamin, and Ehud, and Chenaanah, and Zethan, and Tharshish, and Ahishahar.
And of the sons of Harim; Eliezer, Ishijah, Malchiah, Shemaiah, Shimeon,
And of the sons of Harim; Maaseiah, and Elijah, and Shemaiah, and Jehiel, and Uzziah.
The sons of Moses were, Gershom, and Eliezer.
And of the Levites; Shemaiah the son of Hasshub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, of the sons of Merari;

verses.text: These likewise cast lots over against their brethren the sons of Aaron in the presence of David the king, and Zadok, and Ahimelech, and the chief of the fathers of the priests and Levites, even the principal fathers over against their younger brethren.

similars.text: Then came near the heads of the fathers of the Levites unto Eleazar the priest, and unto Joshua the son of Nun, and unto the heads of the fathers of the tribes of the children of Israel;
And David distributed them, both Zadok of the sons of Eleazar, and Ahimelech of the sons of Ithamar, according to their offices in their service.
